common.notificationPermission: Please enable notification permissions in settings.

coachingBanner.startBody: Turn your aspirations into actionable plans with our AI coach.

fairXP.title: Fair XP Policy
fairXP.dailyLimit: Each action can be checked/unchecked 3 times per day
fairXP.cooldown: Same action can be re-checked after 10 seconds
fairXP.spamLimit: Excessive checking in short time is limited

streak.title: Streak
streak.subtitle: Consecutive Practice
streak.amazing: You're on fire! Keep it up!

nickname.title: Change Nickname
nickname.description: Set a nickname that will be displayed to other users.
nickname.label: Nickname

errors.tooShort: Nickname must be at least 2 characters.
errors.tooLong: Nickname can be up to 12 characters.
errors.invalidChars: Use only Korean/English letters and numbers.

coaching.title: AI Coaching

history.title: Coaching History
history.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this coaching history record?

coaching.inProgress: Coaching in progress ‚Äî I‚Äôm here to help.

coaching.finishConfirmMessage: Some sub-goals are still empty. You can fill them in later.

gate.title: AI Coaching
gate.summaryHint: We limit weekly sessions to keep coaching quality high. Free users get 1 free + 1 ad session.
gate.footer: Ads appear only before starting a session.
gate.adError: Ad is not ready yet. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome gift
welcome.body: Your first coaching session is on us. It helps us keep costs low for everyone.

ad.title: Weekly sessions used
ad.body: Watch one ad to unlock one more session this week.

limit.title: Weekly limit reached
limit.body: You can start again next week or upgrade for unlimited sessions.

consent.title: AI Coaching Data Consent (Required)
consent.body: Manda Coach sends your goals and conversation data to Perplexity AI (USA) to provide personalized coaching and maintain context. You can delete all collected AI data at any time in Settings. Do you agree?

slotGate.title: Mandalart slots
slotGate.heading: Your Mandalart slots are full
slotGate.body: Delete one Mandalart to start AI coaching.
slotGate.deleteSuccess: Deleted. You can now start AI coaching.
slotGate.deleteError: Failed to delete. Please try again.

finalize.instruction: Tap to generate your personal goal system!

step1.title: Tell us about your current situation
step1.subtitle: Let‚Äôs find a plan that fits your life.

questions.dailyTime: How much time can you spend daily?
questions.priorityArea: Which area matters most right now?
questions.afterWorkDifficulty: Is it hard to follow through after work?
questions.busyDifficulty: Is it hard to keep up when busy?
questions.planStability: Can you keep plans during schedule changes?

placeholders.customSituation: e.g., preparing for a career change

step1.validation: Please answer the required questions so I can tailor your plan.

step2.title: Confirm your core goal
step2.subtitle: Let‚Äôs make it specific and measurable.
step2.smartGood: Good: "Launch MandaAct beta with 50 users by March"

personaTip.working_professional: Tip: focus on a goal that fits your work rhythm and energy window.
personaTip.student: Tip: anchor your goal around the semester timeline or next exam cycle.
personaTip.freelancer: Tip: tie your goal to income or delivery milestones you control.
personaTip.custom: Tip: choose a goal that you can measure weekly.

step2.label: Core goal
step2.placeholder: e.g., Build a sustainable workout routine

step3.title: Draft sub-goals
step3.subtitle: We can start with a few and add more later.
step3.minNote: Start with {{count}}; you can add more anytime.

personaTip.working_professional: Consider skills, health, and relationships that support your work-life balance.
personaTip.student: Consider study habits, projects, health, and rest.
personaTip.freelancer: Consider delivery, outreach, finances, and recovery time.
personaTip.custom: Cover the main areas that keep your goal sustainable.

step3.validationMin: Please fill at least {{count}} sub-goals to continue.

step4.title: Draft action items
step4.subtitle: We‚Äôll outline baseline, minimum, and challenge actions for each sub-goal.
step4.criteriaBase: Baseline: doable on a normal day.
step4.criteriaMinimum: Minimum: the smallest action to keep momentum.
step4.criteriaChallenge: Challenge: a stretch for strong days.

personaTip.working_professional: Tip: keep minimum actions under 10‚Äì15 minutes on busy weekdays.
personaTip.student: Tip: tie actions to study blocks between classes.
personaTip.freelancer: Tip: align actions with delivery or outreach blocks you control.
personaTip.custom: Tip: keep actions small enough to repeat weekly.

step4.validation: Please fill in all action fields.
step4.empty: Complete sub-goals to generate action drafts.

step5.title: Reality check
step5.subtitle: I‚Äôll suggest small tweaks so each action is measurable.
step5.rationale: Why: measurable cues make progress easier to verify.
step5.suggestion: Suggestion: add a time cue (e.g., 10 min).
step5.rejectNote: No worries ‚Äî we‚Äôll keep your original wording. You can fine-tune later.

step6.title: Set your routine
step6.subtitle: Pick a rhythm that feels realistic this week.

personaTip.working_professional: Weekday routines work best for most work schedules.
personaTip.student: Match the routine to your class or exam calendar.
personaTip.freelancer: Choose days that won‚Äôt clash with delivery peaks.
personaTip.custom: Pick a rhythm you can keep for at least two weeks.

step6.customHint: If no weekdays are selected, weekly count is used.

step7.title: Final review
step7.subtitle: Give it a final look ‚Äî you can edit later.
step7.modeNote: Minimum/Challenge modes can be toggled later in Mandalart detail (AI coaching plans only).
step7.validation: Please complete required fields before saving.

chat.error: Sorry, an error occurred. Could you say that again?
chat.greeting:
Hello! I'm Manda Coach. Let's have a meaningful conversation together.

First, let me ask ‚Äî have you heard of Mandalart before, or is this your first time?

hints.resilience: Building your safety net for tough days...

chat.purpose: Your Mandalart takes shape through conversation

Small wins lead to big success.
Let's set up your first simple goal.

minimumMode.title: Minimum mode

selector.title: Action Type Settings
selector.description: Select the type and settings for "{{title}}"
selector.routineDesc: Recurring actions like daily, weekly, monthly
selector.missionDesc: Goal with an end (read a book, get certification)
selector.weekdayHint: If no weekdays selected, it will be count-based
selector.dailyHint: For daily actions, select 'Daily' as repeat cycle
selector.referenceInfo: Mind type is not included in achievement rate
selector.reasonRoutineLow: Likely a routine. Add a cycle or completion condition to improve accuracy.
selector.reasonMission: Looks like a goal to complete
selector.reasonReference: Looks like a mindset or principle

plan.title: Plan
plan.subtitle: Pick which action is active or minimum for today.

empty.title: Visualize Your Success
empty.description:
Turn vague dreams into concrete plans.
Start with one core goal.

aiSuggest.title: AI-Suggested Sub-Goals
aiSuggest.subtitle: Ideas tailored to your vision
aiSuggest.empty: Tap the button to get AI-powered ideas

guide.title: Sub-Goal Tips
guide.tip1_desc: Is it a necessary step to achieve your core goal?
guide.tip2_desc: Consider mindset, luck, and attitude, not just skills.
guide.tip3_desc: Use words (e.g., Stamina) that can hold 8 actions.

guide.title: Core Goal Tips
guide.tip1_desc: Make sure it's what YOU want, not others.
guide.tip2_desc: Does imagining it make you smile?
guide.tip3_desc: You need a reason to keep going when it gets tough.

routine.title: Routine Settings
routine.dailyHint: For daily actions, select 'Daily' as repeat cycle

modal.referenceInfo: Reference type is not included in achievement rate

guide.title: Action Writing Tips
guide.tip1_desc: Instead of 'work hard', try 'do it for 10 minutes' with numbers.
guide.tip2_desc: You should be able to clearly check if you did it or not.
guide.tip3_desc: Break it down into something you can start today without pressure.

aiSuggest.title: AI-Suggested Actions
aiSuggest.subtitle: Personalized actions to achieve your goal

subGoalEdit.title: Sub-goal Settings
subGoalEdit.description: You can edit sub-goal and actions
subGoalEdit.noActions:
No actions.
Tap Add button to create one.
subGoalEdit.weekdayNote: If no weekdays selected, weekly count is used

create.title: Create Mandalart
create.subtitle: Create new goals

aiCoaching.title: AI Coaching
aiCoaching.description: Create goals with a warm coaching session

imageUpload.title: Scan Image
imageUpload.hint: Auto-extract text from your mandalart image

textPaste.title: Paste Notes
textPaste.placeholder:
(Example) Core Goal: Healthy Life

1. Exercise
   - Walk 30 min daily
   - Strength training 3x/week
   - Stretching routine
   - Yoga class
   - Go hiking
   - Learn swimming
   - Home workout
   - Cycling

2. Eating Habits
   - Don't skip breakfast
   - Drink 2L water
   - Vegetable-focused diet
   - Reduce processed food

... (Total 8 sub-goals, 8 actions each)
textPaste.exampleContent:
Core Goal: Healthy Life

1. Exercise
- Walk 30 min daily
- Gym 3x/week
...

2. Eating Habits
- Drink 2L water
...
